content: this sour lemon amigurumi is a super quick sweet little pattern that is sure to please little and big hands alike using lily n cream cotton yarn and a us f/3 75mm hook yields a lemon approximately 10 centimeters 4 inches across like this sour little guy he is one of 10 patterns included in my new book all the ways you re important to me a children s bedtime story featuring fun felt and crochet artwork available on etsy bookbaby com and amazon as a paperback live outside the us or prefer pdf the ebook version of all the ways you re important to me is available in my etsy shop https //www etsy com/listing/624265096/pdf-ebook-with-10-crochet-patterns-all ref=shop_home_feat_4
